  echo "This is test2 function"
  echo "I got argument $x"
}


function test3()
{
  echo "This is test3 function"
  return 1
}


test1
test2 200
test3

if [ "$?" -eq 0 ]; then
  echo "test3 function is Success"
else
  echo "test 3 function is Fail"
fi
------------------------------------------
This is test1 function
This is test2 function
I got argument 200
This is test3 function

  • jest-mock-extended íŒ¨í‚¤ì§€ì—ì„œ ì œê³µí•˜ëŠ” mock() í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ë©´ ê°„í¸í•˜ê²Œ ê°€ì§œ ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  jest-mock-extended íŒ¨í‚¤ì§€ì—ì„œ ì œê³µí•˜ëŠ” MockProxyë¡œ mock() í•¨ìˆ˜ê°€ ë°˜í™˜í•˜ëŠ” ê°€ì§œ ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ë¥¼ íƒ€ì…ì„ ì§€ì •í•´ì¤ë‹ˆë‹¤.
import { type MockProxy, mock } from "jest-mock-extended";
import { AuthService } from "./auth.service";
import { UsersService } from "./users.service";

describe("AuthService", () => {
  let usersService: MockProxy<UsersService>;
  let authService: AuthService;

  beforeEach(() => {
    usersService = mock<UsersService>();
    authService = new AuthService(usersService);
  });

  it("throws an error if user is not found", () => {
    usersService.findByEmail.mockReturnValue(null);

    expect(() => authService.logIn("test@email.com", "NOT_FOUND")).toThrow(
      "Not Found"
    );

    expect(usersService.findByEmail).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1);
    expect(usersService.findByEmail).toHaveBeenCalledWith("test@email.com");
  });

  it("throws an error if password does not match", () => {
    usersService.findByEmail.mockReturnValue({
      id: 200,
      email: "test@email.com",
      password: "PASSWORD",
    });

    expect(() => authService.logIn("test@email.com", "WRONG_PASSWORD")).toThrow(
      "Wrong Password"
    );

    expect(usersService.findByEmail).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1);
    expect(usersService.findByEmail).toHaveBeenCalledWith("test@email.com");
  });

  it("returns a user if password matches", () => {
    usersService.findByEmail.mockReturnValue({
      id: 200,
      email: "test@email.com",
      password: "PASSWORD",
    });

    expect(authService.logIn("test@email.com", "PASSWORD")).toHaveProperty(
      "id",
      200
    );

    expect(usersService.findByEmail).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1);
    expect(usersService.findByEmail).toHaveBeenCalledWith("test@email.com");
  });
});

import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react";
import { loadPaymentWidget, ANONYMOUS } from "@tosspayments/payment-widget-sdk";

// êµ¬ë§¤ìì˜ ê³ ìœ  ì•„ì´ë””ë¥¼ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì™€ì„œ customerKeyë¡œ ì„¤ì •í•˜ì„¸ìš”.

const widgetClientKey = "test_gck_docs_Ovk5rk1EwkEbP0W43n07xlzm";
const customerKey = "Ob1ARnMzy_h_ki_JJEy9D";
// const paymentWidget = PaymentWidget(widgetClientKey, PaymentWidget.ANONYMOUS) // ë¹„íšŒì› ê²°ì œ

export function CheckoutPage() {
  const [paymentWidget, setPaymentWidget] = useState(null);
  const paymentMethodsWidgetRef = useRef(null);
  const [price, setPrice] = useState(50_000);

  useEffect(() => {
    const fetchPaymentWidget = async () => {
      try {
        const loadedWidget = await loadPaymentWidget(widgetClientKey, customerKey);
        setPaymentWidget(loadedWidget);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error("Error fetching payment widget:", error);
      }
    };

    fetchPaymentWidget();
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (paymentWidget == null) {
      return;
    }

    // renderPaymentMethods() ë©”ì„œë“œë¡œ ê²°ì œ UIë¥¼ ë Œë”ë§í•˜ì„¸ìš”
    const paymentMethodsWidget = paymentWidget.renderPaymentMethods(
      "#payment-widget",
      { value: price },
      { variantKey: "DEFAULT" }
    );

    // renderAgreement() ë©”ì„œë“œë¡œ ì´ìš©ì•½ê´€ UIë¥¼ ë Œë”ë§í•˜ì„¸ìš”
    paymentWidget.renderAgreement(
      "#agreement", 
      { variantKey: "AGREEMENT" }
    );

    paymentMethodsWidgetRef.current = paymentMethodsWidget;
  }, [paymentWidget, price]);

  useEffect(() => {
    const paymentMethodsWidget = paymentMethodsWidgetRef.current;

    if (paymentMethodsWidget == null) {
      return;
    }
    // ê²°ì œ ê¸ˆì•¡ì„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸í•˜ë ¤ë©´ updateAmount()ë¥¼ í˜¸ì¶œí•˜ì„¸ìš”
    paymentMethodsWidget.updateAmount(price);
  }, [price]);

  const handlePaymentRequest = async () => {
    // ê²°ì œë¥¼ ìš”ì²­í•˜ê¸° ì „ì— orderId, amountë¥¼ ì„œë²„ì— ì €ì¥í•˜ì„¸ìš”.
    // ê²°ì œ ê³¼ì •ì—ì„œ ì•…ì˜ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ê²°ì œ ê¸ˆì•¡ì´ ë°”ë€ŒëŠ” ê²ƒì„ í™•ì¸í•˜ëŠ” ìš©ë„ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.
    try {
      // ê²°ì œ ë²„íŠ¼ì— ê²°ì œ ìš”ì²­ ë©”ì„œë“œ requestPayment()ë¥¼ ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ë¡œ ê±¸ì–´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”
      await paymentWidget?.requestPayment({
        orderId: nanoid(),
        orderName: "í† ìŠ¤ í‹°ì…”ì¸  ì™¸ 2ê±´",
        customerName: "ê¹€í† ìŠ¤",
        customerEmail: "customer123@gmail.com",
        customerMobilePhone: "01012341234",
        // í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ëŠ” ê²°ì œ ì¸ì¦ì´ ì„±ê³µí•˜ë©´ successUrlë¡œ ì´ë™í•˜ê³ , ì‹¤íŒ¨í•˜ë©´ failUrlë¡œ ì´ë™í•´ìš”
        successUrl: `${window.location.origin}/success`, // successUrlë¡œ ì´ë™í•  ë•Œ URLì— paymentType, orderId, paymentKey, amount íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„° ì „ë‹¬ë¨
        failUrl: `${window.location.origin}/fail`,
      });
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error requesting payment:", error);
    }
  };

  return (
    <div>
      {/* í• ì¸ ì¿ í° */}
      <label htmlFor="coupon-box">
        <input
          id="coupon-box"
          type="checkbox"
          onChange={(event) => {
            setPrice(event.target.checked ? price - 5_000 : price + 5_000);
          }}
        />
        <span>5,000ì› ì¿ í° ì ìš©</span>
      </label>
      {/* ê²°ì œ UI, ì´ìš©ì•½ê´€ UI ì˜ì—­ */}
      <div id="payment-widget" />
      <div id="agreement" />
      {/* ê²°ì œí•˜ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼ */}
      <button onClick={handlePaymentRequest}>ê²°ì œí•˜ê¸°</button>
    </div>
  );
}

import axios from "axios";
import { GetServerSideProps } from "next";
import Link from "next/link";

// ------ Payment ê°ì²´ ------
// @docs https://docs.tosspayments.com/reference#payment-ê°ì²´
interface Payment {
  orderName: string;
  approvedAt: string;
  receipt: {
    url: string;
  };
  totalAmount: number;
  method: "ì¹´ë“œ" | "ê°€ìƒê³„ì¢Œ" | "ê³„ì¢Œì´ì²´";
  paymentKey: string;
  orderId: string;
}

export const getServerSideProps: GetServerSideProps = async (context) => {
  const {
    query: { paymentKey, orderId, amount },
  } = context;

  try {
    // ------  ê²°ì œ ìŠ¹ì¸ ------
    // @docs https://docs.tosspayments.com/guides/payment-widget/integration#3-ê²°ì œ-ìŠ¹ì¸í•˜ê¸°
    // ì¿¼ë¦¬ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ì˜ amount ê°’ê³¼ renderPaymentMethods()ì˜ amount íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ì˜ ê°’ì´ ê°™ì€ì§€ ë°˜ë“œì‹œ í™•ì¸í•˜ì„¸ìš”. í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ì—ì„œ ê²°ì œ ê¸ˆì•¡ì„ ì¡°ì‘í•˜ëŠ” í–‰ìœ„ë¥¼ ë°©ì§€í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ë§Œì•½ ê°’ì´ ë‹¤ë¥´ë‹¤ë©´ ê²°ì œë¥¼ ì·¨ì†Œí•˜ê³  êµ¬ë§¤ìì—ê²Œ ì•Œë ¤ì£¼ì„¸ìš”
    // ì„œë²„ë¡œ paymentKey, amount, orderId ê°’ì„ ì „ë‹¬í•˜ì„¸ìš”. ê²°ì œ ìŠ¹ì¸ì— í•„ìš”í•œ ë°ì´í„°ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê²°ì œ ìŠ¹ì¸ ê²°ê³¼ì— ë”°ë¼ í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ì—ì„œ í•„ìš”í•œ ê²°ì œ ì„±ê³µ ë° ì‹¤íŒ¨ ë¡œì§ì„ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ì„¸ìš”
    const { data: payment } = await axios.post<Payment>(
      "https://api.tosspayments.com/v1/payments/confirm",
      {
        paymentKey,
        orderId,
        amount,
      },
      {
        headers: {
          Authorization: `Basic ${Buffer.from(`${process.env.TOSS_PAYMENTS_SECRET_KEY}:`).toString("base64")}`,
        },
      }
    );
    console.log(payment);
    return {
      props: { payment },
    };
  } catch (err: any) {
    console.error("err", err.response.data);

    return {
      redirect: {
        destination: `/fail?code=${err.response.data.code}&message=${encodeURIComponent(err.response.data.message)}`,
        permanent: false,
      },
    };
  }
};

interface Props {
  payment: Payment;
}

export default function SuccessPage({ payment }: Props) {
  return (
    <main>
      <div className="box_section">
        <img width="100px" src="https://static.toss.im/illusts/check-blue-spot-ending-frame.png" />
        <h2>ê²°ì œë¥¼ ì™„ë£Œí–ˆì–´ìš”</h2>
        <div className="p-grid typography--p">
          <div className="p-grid-col text--left">
            <b>ê²°ì œê¸ˆì•¡</b>
          </div>
          <div className="p-grid-col text--right" id="amount">
            {payment.totalAmount.toLocaleString()}ì›
          </div>
        </div>
        <div className="p-grid typography--p">
          <div className="p-grid-col text--left">
            <b>ì£¼ë¬¸ë²ˆí˜¸</b>
          </div>
          <div className="p-grid-col text--right" id="orderId">
            {payment.orderId}
          </div>
        </div>
        <div className="p-grid typography--p">
          <div className="p-grid-col text--left">
            <b>paymentKey</b>
          </div>
          <div className="p-grid-col text--right" id="paymentKey">
            {payment.paymentKey}
          </div>
        </div>
        <div className="p-grid-col">
          <Link href="https://docs.tosspayments.com/guides/payment-widget/integration">
            <button className="button p-grid-col5">ì—°ë™ ë¬¸ì„œ</button>
          </Link>
          <Link href="https://discord.gg/A4fRFXQhRu">
            <button className="button p-grid-col5">
              ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ë¬¸ì˜

}
